title: 香港示威者新招吓退黑警:「我武汉来的，你们会中肺炎」
contents:
來自武漢的絲打，
普通話對撼黑警。

「我站這裏犯法了嗎，你用那東西(胡椒噴霧)想要噴我？」，其後亦說「你們會中肺炎的，告訴你，我來自武漢！」並不斷咳嗽。
#光復香港時代革命 

A middle-aged woman said: "I come from Wuhan!"

#HongKongPolice: *Step back*

Woman: *Cough*

🇭🇰police: "Sorry for disturbing you." Then they leave immediately

HKPF's Motto: "Serving Hong Kong with Honour, Duty and Loyality"

#HongKongProtests #Coronavirus #PoliceState
